categories: Category:Sith of the resurgent Sith Empire

nodes.text: Dryzen Wellis was a male Human who was a Sith Warrior of the reconstituted Sith Empire during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic. During the invasion of the planet Taris, he was stationed at the Toxic Lake Garrison.
Dryzen Wellis first appeared in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic by BioWare as the Sith Warrior class trainer on Taris.
